landing-page-pro.name: Professional Landing Page
landing-page-pro.instructions: Create a stunning, conversion-optimized landing page with hero section, value proposition, features, testimonials, pricing, and strong CTAs. Perfect for any business or service.

saas-landing.name: SaaS Landing Page
saas-landing.instructions: Generate a high-converting SaaS landing page with product demo, feature highlights, pricing tiers, customer testimonials, and trial/signup flows.

ecommerce-landing.name: E-commerce Landing Page
ecommerce-landing.instructions: Build a product-focused landing page with hero product showcase, features, customer reviews, pricing, and purchase CTAs optimized for sales conversion.

portfolio-website.name: Portfolio Website
portfolio-website.instructions: Create a professional portfolio website with work showcase, about section, skills, testimonials, and contact form. Perfect for freelancers and agencies.

business-services.name: Business Services Landing
business-services.instructions: Design a service-based business landing page with service offerings, process explanation, case studies, team section, and lead capture forms.

startup-pitch.name: Startup Pitch Page
startup-pitch.instructions: Build a compelling startup pitch page with problem/solution, product demo, market opportunity, team, and investor/user acquisition CTAs.

app-landing.name: Mobile App Landing
app-landing.instructions: Create an app landing page with app screenshots, key features, download links, user testimonials, and app store optimization elements.

code-interpreter-v1.name: Python data analyst
code-interpreter-v1.instructions: Runs code as a Jupyter notebook cell. Strong data analysis angle. Can use complex visualisation to explain results.

nextjs-developer.name: Next.js developer
nextjs-developer.instructions: A Next.js 13+ app that reloads automatically. Using the pages router.

vue-developer.name: Vue.js developer
vue-developer.instructions: A Vue.js 3+ app that reloads automatically. Only when asked specifically for a Vue app.

streamlit-developer.name: Streamlit developer
streamlit-developer.instructions: A streamlit app that reloads automatically.

gradio-developer.name: Gradio developer
gradio-developer.instructions: A gradio app. Gradio Blocks/Interface should be called demo.
